title: Getting Back to Travel: All Things Trip Planning
itunes:title: Getting Back to Travel: All Things Trip Planning
description:
This week, we’re together in person to talk about TRAVEL! Specifically, travel planning. We have travel on the brain, and thought you might, too. We discuss how we choose our destinations, how far in advance we plan our trips, if we like to plan ourselves or let someone else take over, the trips we have coming up, and MORE! 

 

Our Travel Must-Haves

Olivia - AQUIS Rapid Dry Lisse Hair Wrap Towel

Becca - Sleeping Eye Mask, Megababe Thigh Rescue

 

Our Obsessions

Becca - Hotel Lobby Spa Candle

Olivia - Severance

 

What we read this week:

Becca - The Impossible Us by Sarah Lotz

Olivia - The Last Housewife by Ashley Winstead

 

This Month’s Book Club Pick: Funny You Should Ask by Elissa Sussman

 

Sponsors:

Night - take 20% off almost everything on discovernight.com with code BADONPAPER

Olive & June - visit OliveandJune.com/paper for 20% off your first Mani System

Zocdoc - go to Zocdoc.com/BOP to download the Zocdoc and start your search for a top-rated doctor today.

 

Join our Facebook group for amazing book recs & more! 

 

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. 

 

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Olivia on Instagram @oliviamuenter and Becca @beccamfreeman.
